entities.label: Investigations Division, Office of Internal Oversight Services (ID/OIOS)
Internal Audit Division, Office of Internal Oversight Services (IAD1/OIOS)

edges.label: 1. Subject of Investigation
edges.tooltip: The UNMIL Fuel Cell was the primary focus of the investigation due to fuel mismanagement allegations.

edges.label: 2. Investigation Conducted By
edges.tooltip: The investigation was conducted by the Investigations Division of the Office of Internal Oversight Services.

edges.label: 3. Audit Triggered Investigation
edges.tooltip: An audit by IAD1/OIOS revealed discrepancies in fuel accounting, leading to the investigation.

edges.label: 4. Alleged Mismanagement
edges.tooltip: Officer 1 was alleged to have mismanaged resources, resulting in unaccounted fuel expenses.

edges.label: 5. Alleged Unauthorized Sale
edges.tooltip: Bowser drivers were accused of selling fuel to third parties without authorization.

edges.label: 6. Alleged Unauthorized Sale
edges.tooltip: The supervisor was accused of involvement in unauthorized fuel sales.

edges.label: 7. Oversight Authority
edges.tooltip: UNMIL was responsible for overseeing the operations of the Fuel Cell.

edges.label: 8. Alleged Violation
edges.tooltip: Officer 1 was alleged to have violated Staff Regulation 1.2 regarding integrity and use of resources.

edges.label: 9. Alleged Violation
edges.tooltip: Bowser drivers allegedly violated ST/IC/1996/29 by using organizational assets for unauthorized purposes.

edges.label: 10. Alleged Violation
edges.tooltip: The supervisor allegedly violated ST/IC/1996/29 by allowing unauthorized use of organizational assets.

Officer 1: Mismanagement and waste of resources, specifically inability to account for US$500,000 in fuel expenses.
Bowser Drivers: Selling fuel to third parties without authorization.
Supervisor: Involvement in unauthorized sale of fuel.
